item.title: Report X-2025020155
item.description:
Report X-2025020155

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-08T03:31:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-24
  • City: LYNNFIELD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS PALED AND SORTED TO THE NORTH SORT AISLE. THERE, THE SORTER, NOTICED THE PACKAGE WAS LEAKING. SHE LEFT THE AREA AND NOTIFIED HER SUPERVISOR. THE SUPERVISOR THEN CALLED FOR A DESIGNATED RESPONDER. THE RESPONDER, FOLLOWING THE DECISION TREE AND APPROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET, PLACED THE PACKAGE IN A LINED SPILL TUBE. THE EQUIPMENT WAS DECONTAMINATED FOLLOWING THE DECONTAMINATION CHECKLIST. THE PACKAGE WAS THEN TAKEN TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. IT WAS THERE THE PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED TO BE AN UNDECLARED HAZMAT. AEROSOLS, FLAMMABLE. INNER BOX MARKED WITH LTD QTY MARKING

item.title: Report X-2025011283
item.description:
Report X-2025011283

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-04T06:26:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-28
  • City: SOMERVILLE
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR STYROFOAM PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH AND HEARD THE SOUND OF SOMETHING ROLLING AROUND INSIDE THE BOX. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED LESS THAN ONE POUND OF DRY ICE PELLETS COOLING DNA SAMPLES FOR RESEARCH. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX TO INDICATE DRY ICE WAS BEING USED TO COOL THE DNA SAMPLES. THE TRACKING NUMBER APPEARS TO HAVE BEEN USED ONCE ALREADY FOR A PREVIOUS BOSTON, MASSACHUSETTS TO EUGENE, OREGON SHIPMENT IN JANUARY 2025. THIS PACKAGE IS A RETURN SERVICE PACKAGE THAT WAS SHIPPED FROM BOSTON, MASSACHUSETTS ON 28-JAN-2025 USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 863W29, PLASMIDSAURUS, 1850 MILLRACE DR SUITE 200, EUGENE OR 97403-2095. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
